name: projax
description: CLI tool for managing local development projects

scripts.copy:electron: mkdir -p dist/electron && cp -r ../electron/dist/* dist/electron/ && cp dist/script-runner.* dist/electron/ && cp dist/port-*.* dist/electron/
scripts.copy:api: mkdir -p dist/api && cp -r ../api/dist/* dist/api/ && cp ../api/package.json dist/api/
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run copy:core && npm run build:electron && npm run copy:electron && npm run copy:api
